column5: I know some of you guys are in the Cornwall area, so thought maybe you could give me a heads up on what the Bass are eating, and where the LM's are hiding in the Lancaster area.I will be entering the Lake in South Lancaster at Macs Marina.  Thanks
Oh never mind. I thought you were talking about a church. BTW, St. Francis has a great choir.  Slayer
I just hope they will be singing for me tomorrow. I got skunked this morning, even though huge sturgeon were jumping all around the boat. What an awesome sight that was !!!
